<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Changes the sys_uib_template.description column from a Translated Field to Translated Text so that it is not limited by the max length of Translated Fields.</description>
        <name>Change sys_uib_template description type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateUIBTemplateDescriptionType();
function updateUIBTemplateDescriptionType () {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	gr.addQuery("name", "sys_uib_template");
	gr.addQuery("element", 'description');
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue("internal_type", "translated_text");
		gr.update();
	}
};
]]></script>
